coverages.coverage_name: Trip cancellation and loss of deposit

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased
With 'Cancel for any reason' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip cancelled within 30 days before departure due to specified events: serious injury/illness (insured/companion), death (insured/companion/family), witness in court, serious home damage, serious public event, hijack (>12hrs). Does not cover airline cancellation due to airport/runway/airspace closure or weather.
Covers unused pre-paid accommodation, transport, excursions, tours, activities, and cancellation fees. Does not cover rebooking fees.

Exclusions: Policy purchased <72 hours before departure, refunded amounts, upgrades. Must request refunds from providers first. Claim reduced by refunds received (cash, vouchers, credits, points, miles, re-booking options). Single trip policy ends if this benefit is paid.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased for the affected person. Covers cancellation due to serious injury/illness or death arising from a pre-existing condition.
Cancel for any reason cover reimburses 50% of costs for cancellation due to reasons not covered elsewhere. Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased
With 'Cancel for any reason' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip postponed within 30 days before departure due to specified events: serious injury/illness (insured/companion), death (insured/companion/family), witness in court, serious home damage, serious public event. Does not cover airline cancellation or hijack.
Covers rebooking fees to reorganise the trip to the same destination within 180 days. Does not cover unused expenses.

Exclusions: Policy purchased <72 hours before departure, refunded amounts, upgrades. Must request refunds from providers first. Claim reduced by refunds received. Single trip policy ends if this benefit is paid.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased for the affected person. Covers postponement due to serious injury/illness or death arising from a pre-existing condition.
Cancel for any reason cover reimburses 50% of costs for postponement due to reasons not covered elsewhere. Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased
With 'Cancel for any reason' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if you must return to Singapore early due to specified events overseas: serious injury/illness (insured/companion, confirmed overseas), death (insured/companion/family), witness in court, serious home damage, serious public event, hijack (>12hrs). Does not cover airline cancellation.

Covers unused pre-paid accommodation, transport, excursions, tours, activities, and cancellation fees OR additional administrative/transport/accommodation costs (economy/standard) for immediate return if original ticket cannot be amended. Does not cover rebooking fees for a later trip.

Exclusions: Cost of unused original return ticket, additional expenses if no return ticket originally purchased, costs for buses/taxis/private hire, refunded amounts, upgrades. Must request refunds from providers first. Claim reduced by refunds received.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased for the affected person. Covers cutting trip short due to serious injury/illness or death arising from a pre-existing condition.
Cancel for any reason cover reimburses 50% of costs for cutting trip short (after 48 hours) due to reasons not covered elsewhere. Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit.
Pays if trip is cancelled before departure or disrupted overseas because a travel agent, transport provider, tour operator, or accommodation provider is declared insolvent.
Insolvency means unable to pay debts and ceased operations due to declared insolvency/bankruptcy or owner absconding/under investigation for fraud.
Covers pre-paid unused expenses (accommodation, transport, excursions etc.) and additional transport/accommodation costs (economy/standard).
Exclusions: Refunded amounts, claims if policy purchased less than 72 hours before departure. Single trip policy ends if paid for cancellation before departure.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.

base_limits.basis: S$100 for every six hours diverted while overseas

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays S$100 for each continuous 6-hour period you are diverted to another destination while travelling on an airplane, before reaching your scheduled destination.
Requires written proof of diversion from the provider/agent showing duration and reason.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.

base_limits.limit: S$100 for every six hours delay
S$100 for the first six hours delay only

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if your scheduled public transport is delayed or overbooked for 6 continuous hours or more.
Pays S$100 for each 6 continuous hours of delay overseas. For delays departing Singapore, pays S$100 only for the first 6 hours.
Requires checking in on time for original booking. Requires written proof from provider/agent showing duration and reason for delay.
Exclusion: Delay caused by you, your family member, or travel companion.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.

base_limits.basis: S$100 for every six hours you are stranded

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if you miss a travel connection because your incoming scheduled public transport arrives late, and no alternative travel is available within 6 hours of the scheduled departure of your next connection.
Pays S$100 for each 6 continuous hours you are stranded.
Requires checking in on time for original booking. Requires written proof from provider/agent showing duration and reason for delay.
Exclusion: Delay caused by you, your family member, or travel companion.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip disrupted in Singapore or overseas, forcing itinerary change due to: your serious injury/illness (medically unfit to travel, confirmed by practitioner), serious public event at destination, or flight cancellation by airline due to airport/runway/airspace closure or poor weather.
Covers additional transport/accommodation (economy/standard) to continue trip OR unused pre-paid accommodation/transport due to itinerary change.

Exclusions: Expenses extending trip beyond original schedule, refunded amounts, upgrades, claims resulting from airline fault (e.g., aircrew rotation, rescheduling, operational requirements, mechanical breakdown). Must request refunds first.
Terrorism cover applies, subject to benefit limits and conditions.
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased. Covers disruption due to serious injury/illness arising from a pre-existing condition.
Benefits provided by the policy for claims resulting directly from an act of terrorism during the trip are payable, subject to the limits and conditions specified for each benefit.
Act of terrorism defined as an act involving force/violence by person/group for political, religious, ideological purposes to influence government or put public in fear.

base_limits.limit: S$150 for every six hours of delay
S$150 for first six hour delay only

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if checked-in baggage is delayed, misdirected, or misplaced by public transport provider for 6 continuous hours or more after arrival at scheduled destination (including return to Singapore).
Pays S$150 per 6-hour period of delay (first 6 hours only if delay occurs in Singapore). Requires written proof from provider/agent stating name, date, time, duration, and reason.
Paid per claim, not per piece of baggage. Only one person paid if multiple people share baggage.

coverages.coverage_name: Theft of or damage to baggage or personal belongings

base_limits.type: Sub-limit for all other items (per item)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if baggage or personal belongings are stolen, accidentally damaged, or lost by an airline operator during the trip.

Payment based on depreciation (using formulas for mobile phone, laptop/electronics, other belongings) or 100% of purchase price for jewellery, capped at limits. Without proof of purchase, pays current market value up to S$50 per item (max 5 items). We decide whether to repair, replace or pay cash. Damaged items may become our property.

Conditions: Mobile phones, laptops, tablets, jewellery must be carried by you (not checked-in or left in vehicle unattended). Items must be under your care or authorised person's care. Report theft to police/authority within 24 hours. Benefit reduced by any Baggage Delay payment for the same items.

Exclusions: Perishables, consumables, motorised vehicles/accessories, traveller/credit/prepaid cards, wear & tear, gradual deterioration, musical instruments, unauthorised phone costs, items not owned by you, sports equipment (covered separately if optional cover bought), business goods/equipment, information on storage devices, unexplained loss/mysterious disappearance.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss of passport, travel documents & theft of money

base_limits.type: Sub-limit for theft of your money

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if passport, other travel documents, money, or travellers' cheques are lost or stolen while overseas.
Reimburses the value of stolen cash or travellers' cheques (up to sub-limit) and costs to replace passport/travel documents overseas.

Conditions: Call Emergency Assistance (+65 6322 2072) for advice on replacing documents. Items must have been under your care, securely locked, or in care of authorised person. Money must be stolen while carried by you (not checked-in or left in vehicle unattended). Report loss/theft to police/authority within 24 hours.
Reimburses unauthorised charges made on your credit card while overseas.

Conditions: Report unauthorised charges or card theft to credit card issuer and police in the country where it happened within 24 hours of discovery. Follow all rules set by your credit card issuer for dealing with unauthorised charges/lost cards.
Exclusions: Charges made by your family member, travel companion, or any person you entrusted with your credit card details.
Covers the excess or deductible you become legally liable to pay due to accidental loss or damage to a rental car from a licensed operator.

Conditions: You must be a named driver/co-driver, legally allowed to drive overseas, driving at the time of incident, followed rental agreement rules and local laws. Rental car must be collected overseas. Requires providing rental agreement, receipts for excess paid, and related reports.
Only one claim paid for the insured rental car under this or any other policies while rented by you.
This cover is included in the base policy for First and Business plans.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers medically necessary evacuation/repatriation for life-threatening illness/injury overseas, or return of remains. Requires calling Emergency Assistance (+65 6322 2072) first. We decide on appropriate facility and transport method.
Pays for air/surface ambulance, regular transport, administrative fees for ticket changes, reasonable overseas mortician costs (embalmment, cremation, basic casket/urn).
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased. Limit applies if evacuation/repatriation is due to a pre-existing condition.

coverages.coverage_name: Personal liability while on your trip

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if you are held legally responsible for accidental death or bodily injury to another person, or loss/damage to their property, while overseas. Other person must not be an interested party.
Pays damages awarded by court (excluding punitive damages) and legal costs agreed by us for defence.
Conditions: Do not admit liability or negotiate payment without our written permission. Forward all communications to us. Get our agreement before engaging your own lawyer.

Exclusions: Damages from criminal proceedings, loss/damage to property in your care/custody, liability from owning/using firearms, animals, motorised vehicles, watercraft, aircraft (incl. drones), remote controlled devices, bicycles, liability connected to your trade, business or profession.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays a lump sum if you suffer an accident during the trip that causes death or total and permanent disability (TPD) within 90 days.
TPD means unable to work in any job/business for 6 consecutive months due to the accident and unlikely ever to do so.

Pays percentage of benefit limit for specific injuries (e.g., 100% for loss of 2+ limbs/both eyes, 50% for 1 limb/1 eye/hearing in 1 ear/speech, specified % for burns). Maximum payout is 100% of sum insured per person per accident.
Covers disappearance if on public transport that is wrecked/sinks; presumed dead after 1 year if body not found.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan
Sub-limit for dental expenses caused by accident

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Reimburses costs for medically necessary treatment received overseas for an unexpected illness or injury suffered on the trip. Covers treatment for up to 30 days from the date of first treatment.

Includes reasonable ambulance costs, treatment by specialist if referred by GP, mobility aids (e.g., crutches, wheelchairs, not prosthesis), medical equipment, dental treatment necessary due to accident.

Exclusions: Dental treatment due to tooth/gum/oral disease or normal wear, non-natural teeth (dentures, bridges, implants, fillings, crowns), treatment by interested party, planned or pre-arranged overseas medical treatment.
Pre-existing conditions cover applies only if optional cover purchased. Limit applies if medical expense is due to a pre-existing condition.

base_limits.type: Per Day in Intensive Care Unit (ICU)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays a benefit for each continuous 24-hour period you are confined to an overseas hospital due to an unexpected illness or injury suffered on the trip. Admission must be medically necessary.
Daily amount is doubled if confined in an intensive care unit (ICU).

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' optional cover purchased

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Automatically extends the period of insurance free of charge if your return to Singapore is delayed by a serious public event, or you are confined to an overseas hospital upon advice of a medical practitioner.
Extension duration is longer if due to a covered pre-existing condition (requires optional cover purchase).

Reimburses costs of phone calls made while overseas to: FWD Emergency Assistance hotline (for medical help or lost documents), police, medical facilities, consulates, or family members in Singapore, as a result of suffering a serious illness or injury during the trip.

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard accommodation) for one adult family member to travel to be with you, or for a travel companion to stay with you, if you suffer an unexpected illness/injury overseas AND are confined to hospital for at least 5 continuous days AND a medical practitioner confirms you cannot return to Singapore for further treatment AND you have no adult family member with you.
Payment stops 30 days after first confinement or when medical practitioner confirms you are fit to continue trip or return to Singapore, whichever is earlier.
If you die after being hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) will be paid (the highest amount).

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard accommodation) for an adult family member to travel to be with you if you suffer an unexpected illness/injury overseas AND are confined to hospital for at least 5 continuous days AND a medical practitioner confirms you cannot return to Singapore for further treatment AND you are travelling with one or more children and are the only adult.
Payment stops 30 days after first confinement or when medical practitioner confirms you are fit to continue trip or return to Singapore, whichever is earlier.
If you die after being hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) will be paid (the highest amount).

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard accommodation) for one adult family member to travel to arrange the return of your bodily remains to Singapore or your home country if you die from an unexpected illness or injury suffered while overseas on a trip AND there is no other adult family member on the trip.
If you die after being hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) will be paid (the highest amount).

coverages.coverage_name: Chinese medicine practitioner, physiotherapist and chiropractor expenses

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays for treatment by Chinese medicine practitioner, physiotherapist, or chiropractor overseas or within 48 hours of returning to Singapore, if needed due to an unexpected illness or injury suffered while overseas.
Conditions: You must have received medical treatment overseas for the same illness/injury OR you seek the Chinese med/physio/chiro treatment within 48 hours of returning to Singapore.
Exclusion: Treatment received from an interested party.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan
Sub-limit for dental expenses caused by accident

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Reimburses costs for medically necessary treatment received in Singapore after returning from the trip, if needed for an unexpected illness or injury suffered while overseas.
Conditions: You must have received medical treatment overseas for the same illness/injury OR you seek medical treatment in Singapore within 48 hours of returning.
Covers treatment for up to 30 days from the date you return to Singapore (if treatment sought within 48 hours).
Includes reasonable ambulance costs, treatment by specialist if referred by GP, mobility aids (not prosthesis), medical equipment, dental treatment necessary due to accident.
Exclusions: Dental treatment due to tooth/gum/oral disease or normal wear, non-natural teeth (dentures, bridges, implants, fillings, crowns), treatment received from an interested party.

coverages.coverage_name: Daily hospital cash while in Singapore

base_limits.type: Per Day in Intensive Care Unit (ICU)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays a benefit for each continuous 24-hour period you are confined to a hospital in Singapore as a result of an unexpected illness or injury suffered while overseas on the trip. Admission must be medically necessary.
Conditions: Confinement must be within 48 hours of your return to Singapore OR within 30 days after returning if you had sought medical treatment for the condition during your trip.
Daily amount is doubled if confined in an intensive care unit (ICU).

limits.basis: S$50 for every six hours of delay

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays S$50 for each 6-hour period your scheduled public transport back to Singapore is delayed, provided you, your family member or travel companion are not the cause of the delay. Requires your pet to be staying in a pet hotel or kennel during your trip.

Pays if your sports equipment is stolen, accidentally damaged, or lost by airline/transport/accommodation provider during the trip. Covers cost of renting replacement equipment (up to S$100/day) and compensation for the stolen/damaged equipment.
Covered equipment: golf clubs, diving gear, skis (boards/poles), snowboards, wakeboards, bicycles, fishing tackle equipment, specialist apparel for diving/skiing/snowboarding.

Payment based on depreciation/age (100% if bought during trip, 70% if 1yr old, 50% if 2yrs old, 20% if 3yrs+ old), capped at limit. Without proof of purchase, pays current market value up to S$50 per item (max 5 items).
Conditions: Equipment must be under your care, securely locked, or in care of authorised person. Report theft to police/authority within 24 hours.
Exclusion: Damage that happens while the sports equipment is in use (practice or play).
Pays if your home contents are lost or damaged due to fire or burglary while you are overseas on your trip.
Home contents means household furniture, furnishing, domestic electronic appliances, personal belongings owned by you and in your home. Excludes cash and travellers' cheques.

Payment based on depreciation/age (70% if <1yr old, 50% if 1-2yrs old, 30% if 2-3yrs old, 20% if >3yrs old), capped at limit. Without proof of purchase, pays current market value up to S$50 per item (max 5 items). We decide repair/replace/cash. Damaged items may become our property.
